name: Fennel With Olive Oil Dipping Sauce
keywords: appetizer, fall, fennel, olive oil, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 clove garlic, peeled and lightly crushed
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: For the dipping sauce, combine half the olive oil and garlic in a small saucepan and turn heat to medium-low. Cook, shaking pan occasionally, until garlic begins to sizzle. Remove garlic from oil, and pan from heat. Add cold oil to pan along with salt, pepper and lemon zest to taste.
Trim fennel, and cut into thin strips. Serve with dipping sauce.
